pretty-php.formatting.sortImportsBy.description: Set the sort order for consecutive alias/import statements
markdownEnumDescriptions: Group imports by type without changing order

pretty-php.formatting.simplifyStrings.description: Normalise escape sequences in strings, and replace single- and double-quoted strings with the most readable and economical syntax

pretty-php.formatting.heredocIndentation.description: Set the indentation level of heredocs and nowdocs
markdownEnumDescriptions:
Apply hanging indentation to inline heredocs

```php
<?php
$alpha = <<<EOF
    Content
    EOF;
$bravo =
    <<<EOF
    Content
    EOF;
```

Always apply hanging indentation to heredocs

```php
<?php
$alpha = <<<EOF
    Content
    EOF;
$bravo =
    <<<EOF
        Content
        EOF;
```

pretty-php.formatting.operatorPlacement.description: Place operators before or after newlines when splitting code over multiple lines
markdownEnumDescriptions:
Place arithmetic operators at the start of the line

```php
<?php
$baz =
    $foo ||
    $bar;
$a = ($b
        / $c)
    * 100;
```

Place operators at the start of the line

```php
<?php
$baz =
    $foo
    || $bar;
$a = ($b
        / $c)
    * 100;
```

Place operators at the end of the line

```php
<?php
$baz =
    $foo ||
    $bar;
$a = ($b /
        $c) *
    100;
```

pretty-php.formatting.tightDeclarationSp.description: Remove blank lines between declarations of the same type where possible

pretty-php.formatting.alignment.alignCha.markdownDescription:
Align consecutive object operators in the same chain of method calls

```php
<?php
$result = $foo->bar()
              ->baz();
```

pretty-php.formatting.alignment.alignCom.markdownDescription:
Align comments beside code

```php
<?php
$i = 0;               // index
$value = Foo::bar();  // value
```

pretty-php.formatting.alignment.alignFn.markdownDescription:
Align arrow function expressions with their definitions

```php
<?php
$obj->Callback = fn($value) =>
                     $this->receive($value);
```

pretty-php.formatting.alignment.alignLis.markdownDescription:
Align arguments, array elements and other list items with their owners

```php
<?php
$obj->method($arg1,
             $arg2);
```

pretty-php.formatting.alignment.alignTer.markdownDescription:
Align ternary and null coalescing operators with their expressions

```php
<?php
$alpha = $bravo
             ? $charlie
             : $delta;
```

pretty-php.formatting.blankBeforeReturn.markdownDescription: Add a blank line before `return` and `yield` statements unless they appear consecutively or at the beginning of a compound statement

pretty-php.formatting.strictLists.description: Arrange items in lists horizontally or vertically by replicating the arrangement of the first and second items

pretty-php.formatting.preserveOneLineSta.markdownDescription: Suppress newlines in statements and control structures that start and end on the same line, including individual `case` statements

pretty-php.formatting.psr12.markdownDescription: Enforce strict compliance with [PSR-12](https://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-12/) / [PER Coding Style](https://www.php-fig.org/per/coding-style/) where implemented, ignoring other settings if necessary
